channel.title: Trying to add Candlekeep Mysteries items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trying to add Candlekeep Mysteries items"

item.title: Re: Trying to add Candlekeep Mysteries items
item.content:encoded: Just updating this thread by saying all the new items from the Candlekeep Mysteries book have been added.

item.title: Re: Trying to add Candlekeep Mysteries items
item.content:encoded: I don't have a good pdf of candlekeep mysteries yet, but once I get it, I can help with adding items. If you're looking for an example of how to implement a "Unknown rarity" section, you can check the Homebrew Items section where that's already a pre-established category. Transferring it over to the normal items pages shouldn't be too much of a change, though any changes will have to be made for all subpages (armor, rings, wondrous items, etc).

item.title: Trying to add Candlekeep Mysteries items
item.content:encoded:
I was trying to add some of the new items from Candlekeep Mysteries, but I not used to the coding on this site, so I couldn't get it to work exactly. Just asking if anyone with more experience that myself would be able to help.

Here's one of the items I managed to make a page for:
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:orcus-figurine

And a page of Candlekeep Mysteries exclusive items (I've already added it to the main page):
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:cm

A lot the ite in Candlekeep Mysteries don't have a rarity specified, so I tried adding a new "Unknown" section, which might require a bit of coding and why thing are goofing up. Anyway, I'd appreciate any help!
